SELECT LECTURE_CODE , LECTURE_TITLE , LECTURE_SUBJECT , LECTURE_STUDENT , LECTURE_PERIOD , LECTURE_PRICE , INSTRUCTOR_CODE FROM LECTURE
WHERE INSTRUCTOR_CODE = #{instructorCode}
SELECT LECTURE_CODE , LECTURE_TITLE , LECTURE_SUBJECT , LECTURE_STUDENT , LECTURE_PERIOD , LECTURE_PRICE , INSTRUCTOR_CODE FROM LECTURE WHERE LECTURE_CODE = #{lectureCode}
SELECT STUDENT_CODE , STUDENT_NAME , STUDENT_AGE , STUDENT_GENDER , STUDENT_TEL , STUDENT_ADDR , MEMBER_ID , LECTURE_CODE FROM STUDENT WHERE LECTURE_CODE = #{lectureCode}

SELECT ROWNUM , LECTURE_CODE , LECTURE_TITLE , LECTURE_SUBJECT , LECTURE_STUDENT , LECTURE_PERIOD , LECTURE_PRICE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NUM , LECTURE_CODE , LECTURE_TITLE , LECTURE_SUBJECT , LECTURE_STUDENT , LECTURE_PERIOD , LECTURE_PRICE FROM ( SELECT * FROM LECTURE ORDER BY LECTURE_CODE DESC ) ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
